meanings.definition: A gyrostat is a rotating body that maintains its orientation in space.
meanings.sent1: The gyrostats on the spaceship kept it pointed in the right direction.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the gyrostats to understand how they stay stable while spinning.
meanings.sent3: The gyrostats at the amusement park made the ride feel like a thrilling space adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of thoughts, spinning like gyrostats in the vastness of space.
meanings.sent5: The gyrostats hummed softly as they spun, creating a mesmerizing display of motion.

meanings.definition: Gyrostats are used in navigation systems to provide stability and control.
meanings.sent1: The pilot relied on the gyrostats to keep the plane steady during turbulent weather.
meanings.sent2: The engineers installed gyrostats in the ship to ensure it stayed on course during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous robot reprogrammed the gyrostats to play music instead of guiding the spaceship.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a set of gyrostats, keeping her focused and unwavering in her goals.
meanings.sent5: The gyrostats acted as a silent guardian, guiding the vessel through the treacherous waters.
